title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 17 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 17 2022
description:
Dr. Fauci sighting on local San Diego news station, still wants to take away freedom of Americans. People in blue states aren't done with covid fear. Masks are the MAGA hats of the left. Will NYC bench unvaxxed Yanks and Mets? The WHO says "it's far too soon" to lift covid restrictions. Senator Rand Paul joins Clay and Buck to discuss NCAA basketball brackets, calling for investigations of Dr Fauci and the CDC. Bill Barr, former Attorney General to President George H.W. Bush and President Donald Trump, joins Buck in studio in NYC to discuss with C&B Putin's invasion of Ukraine, election integrity and his new book, One Damn Thing After Another: Memoirs of an Attorney General.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
